name: Last Line of Defense
description:
Last Line of Defense is a 2-4 person multiplayer couch co-op. Play as a ragtag crew trying to prevent the end of the galaxy from impending apocalypses! LLoD is minigame-based featuring one hub world and three apocalypse minigames. 

Players select their minigame on the hub world and then enter into one of three minigames:

  • Core Stops - Sidescroller with timing-based input progression
  • Meteor Storm - Deflecting meteors to prevent platform destruction
  • Arrival of the Great Old One - Item  collection and crafting for offering Ech’ridol

Win 5 minigames to save the world, lose 3 minigames, and the world is destroyed!

Can you and your friends band together as The Last Line of Defense to save the galaxy?
